The Knowledge Base
Prev  Chapter 7. BDI Architecture for SPADE Agents  Next

The Knowledge Base

Accessing the KB is really simple. As said, you can add knowledge, delete it, or make query for it.

		#Inserts a Knowledge
		agent.addBelieve(expr("value(1)"))

		#Deletes a Knowledge
		agent.removeBelieve(expr("value(2)"))

		#Ask for a Knowledge
		agent.askBelieve(expr("value(1)"))
		True

		agent.askBelieve(expr("value(X)"))
		True
